PROS AND CONS.long_desc:
Pros and Cons mainly focusses on Microprocessor and Microcontrollers programming.

It tests the conceptual understanding of students and their programming and analyzing skills.

It consists of 2 Rounds wherein the first round is MCQ based assessing followed by Interviews in the second Round.

ELECTROTRIX.long_desc: Electrotrix tests your knowledge on the basic concepts of circuit theory and electronic circuits which can ultimately help you in designing any basic circuit. The first round is a MCQ based test followed by an interview.

CODE MANTRA.long_desc:
Hey Coders,
“Programming isn't about what you know, it's about what you can figure out”
To celebrate the spirit of programming Apocalypse brings “Code Mantra Contest”, a knockout coding contest in which each of the participants will get a chance to fight and win to survive in the competition.
No competition is completed without rewards, hence stand a chance to win prizes
Note:
Only 2nd and 3rd years are allowed.

DIGI-LOGI.long_desc: Digi-Logi is based on the concepts of Digital electronic circuitsf and basic networking circuits. The questions will be limited within the syllabus . First round is MCQ 30mins, Second round is tech interview. Those who clear mcq will be called up for tech interview. Details of the next round will be intimidated after the successful completion of the initial round

SIGNAL SYNC.long_desc:
Want to find out how strong you are correlated with signals & systems? This event is all about it. Questions will be from your syllabus.
1st round--> MCQ'S
2nd round --> interview

BIG-O.long_desc:
The First Round will be a MCQ type based on time complexity in algorithms, pseudo code.

The Second round will be problem solving on Time and space complexity

PROJECTINA.long_desc: The participants are asked to present a project on their areas of interest .The projects based on IOT and embedded systems are most welcomed.

CONNECTIONS.long_desc:
Hey Folks!!!

This is an interesting and fun-filled non technical event & it's all about connecting the pictures to find the answer out of it.

IPL AUCTION.long_desc:
Love to bid? Join our auction party

The ultimate bidding strategy

Catch the action at the Auction!!!

MOVIE QUIZ.long_desc:
Are you a film freak?

Do you know movies better than you know yourself?!

Then take our incredibly interesting quiz and explore the cinematic universe!!

PHOTOGRAPHY.long_desc:
Capture a picture that has the magic to make the moment last forever.
Instructions
  • Editing and filters are not allowed
  • No plagiarism
  • Selfies not allowed
  • Caption the image
Mail your photographs to photography.eea2021@gmail.com

MEME CONTEST.long_desc:
Tired of laughing at other's memes. Join us and make others laugh at yours
  • Meme Should be a Post
  • Submit your memes on or before December -22 @ 10 P.M
  • We will judge the submissions especially by originality , overall humour and number of likes.
  • Send your memes via instagram @corona_vs_me or WhatsApp @ 7339027909 with Name, Reg No, Department Name.
Note :
  • No plagiarism
  • No vulgarity

VOICE OVER.long_desc: The Participants are asked to dub the muted video with accurate words, slang, emotion and style!!

MOVIE REVIEW.long_desc:
Ever thought of becoming another blue sattai or panda!!

Here's the chance to reveal the movie reviewer side of yours!!

Note:
  • Movie name will be give on the spot
  • Languages: Tamil, English, Malayalam

HOW STUFF WORKS.long_desc:
Ever wondered why things are the way they are?
Does the working and reason behind the existence of things make your mind agog?
Then, buckle up, for you will be tested on how you perceive and understand everything, and by everything, we mean everything.
Come, participate in the How Stuff Works Quiz.

CASE CHALLENGE.long_desc:
Case: Why should we participate in Apocalypse's Case Challenge?

Background: It is a fun event which will test your data interpretation and business problem solving skills.

Reasoning: Due to their dynamic and challenging nature, case competitions are well worth considering. It is an amazing way to put your technical skills to the test and your classroom knowledge into practice.

Target audience: Guys who prefer to work outside IT and Core and anyone with logical thought process.

Verdict: Register to our event guys!

TREASURE HUNT.long_desc:
The idea of hunting for hidden treasures has always been exciting and adventurous!

We bring you an opportunity to awaken your inner Holmes. Join us in the Adventure!!

GENERAL QUIZ.long_desc: Isn't life a collection of weird quizzes with no answers to half the questions? Join us to explore a few of 'em.

MR AND MS TECHNOCRAT.long_desc: Being termed students,Toppers, Engineers we always hid behind titles. Here's your chance to shine alone and ablaze.Join us for the grand title event of Apocalypse Mr and Ms Technocrat and earn exciting prizes! It's fun, it's Invigorating and most importantly its non-technical.Stay tuned for the surprise events and get an amazing chance to explore yourselves along the journey. Do register.

IMAGE PROCESSING.long_desc:
Webinar on Image Processing
By Dr.Prashanth Chandran,
scholar at Zurich University

CRYPTOCURRENCY.long_desc:
Introduction to Blockchain Technology.

Detailed explanation of Cryptocurrencies and their uses will be discussed.

DIGITAL ART AND VFX.long_desc: Introduction to digital art in photoshop and basics of VFX
